item.title: 508 bulby how to change the max skill level
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

I have!

This is my public int getlevelforxp:

[code=java]
public int getLevelForXP(int skillId) {
int exp = skillXP[skillId];
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

    for (int lvl = 1; lvl < 250; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
        if ((output - 1) >= exp) {
            return lvl;
        }
    }

return 99;
}[/code]

And it says 99, but the skill level remains at 136â€¦

Read full topic
item.source: 508 bulby how to change the max skill level
